Package com.flipkart.dao

Class ProfessorDAOOperation

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.ProfessorDAOOperation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProfessorDAOInterface
public class ProfessorDAOOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProfessorDAOInterface
Undertakes all operations for professor related queries to the database
